title: Slow cooker Thai curried beef
ingredients: ['900g diced beef', '1/8 teaspoon salt', '325g diced onion', '4 cloves garlic, minced', '1 (400ml) tin coconut milk', '180ml beef stock', '3 tablespoons red curry paste', '2 tablespoons lime juice', '2 tablespoons peanut oil', '2 jalapeno chilli peppers, seeded and minced', '1 tablespoon brown sugar', '60g baby spinach', 'water', '775g jasmine rice', '20g fresh basil leaves (optional)']
